background_description: The bird is situated on light brown, sandy ground. The immediate foreground and mid-ground feature sparse green herbaceous plants, some with small pinkish-purple flowers, and scattered dry twigs or desiccated plant matter. The distant background is blurred, showing a continuation of the arid landscape with muted brown-green tones under a pale, overcast sky.
explanation: The bird displays effective camouflage through color blending. Its sandy-brown plumage on the back and wings, combined with a creamy underside, closely matches the color of the dry, sandy ground and arid vegetation. This high color similarity and relatively low contrast difference with its surroundings make it difficult to spot, allowing it to blend seamlessly into its natural desert-like habitat.
